text: <@U02F8LF2X> This looks pretty interesting to play with. Any chance we could get one for the office? <http://femto.io/>

text: well we have all the parts for that on the bench so you could easily make a breadboard version of that
wouldn't be as small.. or purple. but would be functionally equivalent so good enough for experimentation
or did you have an idea for it that required small size?
No need for a smaller one. Making one out of components is perfect.
